com.cigital.insecurepay.dao

Class TransferFundsDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.BaseDao
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.dao.TransferFundsDao

  • public class TransferFundsDao
extends BaseDao
    TransferFundsDao extends BaseDao. This class handles transferring funds from one user to another.
